name: Synergy as a Service
description:
Synergy as a Service is a meter management meeting simulator. Leverage and align your way to a complete presentation! Play in your browser or download the game to play it on your computer.

This game was created for the Wonderville NYC Kickstarter. It's an idea I’ve had for years and finally brought to life. I’m in meetings literally all the time and most of them are exactly like this game.

How to play

One player, keyboard only—add more fingers to make it more fun!

Credits

  • Catt Small: Game designer & developer
  • Will Blanton: Music & SFX
